content.en: Voice disorder detection: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to detect and classify voice disorders. They have investigated various techniques, such as higher-order statistics analysis, Mel-frequency cepstral coefficients (MFCC), genetic algorithms, and deep neural networks. These algorithms show promise in accurately identifying voice pathologies, and could potentially be used in a machine-learning based system for screening voice disorders.
content.da: Registrering af stemmeforstyrrelser: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at opdage og klassificere stemmeforstyrrelser. De har undersøgt forskellige teknikker, såsom højere ordens statistisk analyse, Mel-frekvens cepstral koefficienter (MFCC), genetiske algoritmer og dybe neurale netværk. Disse algoritmer viser potentiale til præcist at identificere stemmepatologier og kunne potentielt anvendes i et maskinlæringsbaseret system til screening af stemmeforstyrrelser.
